select a.aSeq ,a.title ,a.content ,a.newspaper ,a.aAbroadNy ,a.aEvent ,a.aLeague ,a.reporter ,a.aDelNy ,a.aCreatedAt ,a.aModifiedAt ,u.email as email
ORDER BY a.aSeq DESC

select a.aSeq ,a.title ,a.content ,a.newspaper ,a.aAbroadNy ,a.aEvent ,a.aLeague ,a.reporter ,a.aDelNy ,a.aCreatedAt ,a.aModifiedAt ,u.email as email ,au.path as path ,au.uuidName as uuidName from article a inner join user u on u.seq = a.createdBy inner join articleUploaded au on au.pseq = a.aSeq where 1=1 and a.aSeq = #{aSeq}
SELECT ccSeq , ifccName , codeGroup_ccgSeq as ccgSeq FROM article WHERE 1=1 AND ifccDelNy = 0 AND ifccUseNy = 1

SELECT a.aSeq ,a.title ,a.content ,a.newspaper ,a.aAbroadNy ,a.aEvent ,a.aLeague ,a.reporter ,a.aCreatedAt ,a.aModifiedAt ,u.email as email ,au.path as path ,au.uuidName as uuidName FROM article a inner join user u on u.seq = a.createdBy inner join articleUploaded au on au.pseq = a.aSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.aSeq DESC limit 99999999999 )aa limit 6
select ac.seq ,ac.comment ,ac.modifiedAt ,u.id as id from article_comment ac inner join user u on u.seq = ac.createdBy where 1=1 and article_seq = #{aSeq} and DelNy = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) from article_comment ac inner join user u on u.seq = ac.createdBy where 1=1 and article_seq = #{aSeq} and DelNy = 0
select t.teamSeq ,t.abroadNy ,t.event ,t.league ,t.teamName ,t.stadium from team t group by abroadNy
select t.teamSeq ,t.abroadNy ,t.event ,t.league ,t.teamName ,t.stadium from team t where 1=1 and abroadNy = #{abroadNy} group by event
select t.teamSeq ,t.abroadNy ,t.event ,t.league ,t.teamName ,t.stadium from team t where 1=1 and abroadNy = #{gAbroadNy} and event = #{event} group by league
